name: Dwarf's Treasure
description:
Two adventurers find a map of an ancient ruin with a valuable treasure inside it. One of them takes the risk and enters the place, and the other was helping him, advicing the dangers that lurkes inside.

Features

Play as an explorer, who has the mision to retrieve the treasure, or choose the cartographer, who has to help his partner find the artifact.

Notes
  • The game not uses online features, just select one character and start playing.
